subject: How to test void methods using JUnit
msgSnippet: Hi, I m having a java application, i want to test all the methods available in this application. I can able to test the method having the return type like
messageBody:
Hi,

I'm having a java application, i want to test all the methods available
in this application.
I can able to test the method having the return type like
boolean,String,int,Vector,Hashtable.

But i don't know how to test the void methods in this application.

Please give the suggestions to test the void methods using JUnit.

With Regards
Karuppiah
